translations: v.用筏运送（raft 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: We went white-water rafting on the Colorado River.
sentences.translation: 我们到科罗拉多河湍急的河水中划皮划艇。

sentences.sentence: “It’s my first rafting trip,” I said.
sentences.translation: “这是我第一次做木筏，”我说道。

sentences.sentence: It read: "Fancy rafting across the Atlantic?"
sentences.translation: 广告上这样写到：“喜欢用筏子横跨大西洋吗？”
